程序包 pacman.controller

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    GameController
    Class GameController manipulates game objects and update changes to the view.
    HighScore
    The class initiates highscore.fxml.
    HighScoreController
    The class operates with controls in highscore.fxml.
    Pacman
    The class initiates pacman.fxml.
    Reader
    This class reads content from highscore.txt.
    Setup
    The class initiates setup.fxml.
    SetupController
    The class operates with controls in setup.fxml.
    StartpageController
    The class operates with controls in startpage.fxml.
    Writer
    This class write scores stored in ScoreRecord into highscore.txt file.
